data.actual_result: You have an editted duplicate of your first editted message
data.expected_result: You should be able to edit your 2nd message and don’t see your previous message
data.short_description: When in edit mode if you edit the first message to your 2nd you have the same message in your chatbox instead of the actual message you want to edit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a text channel  - Type as example: `hahayes` and send it - Now type as example: `hahano` and send it - Go to edit mode of `hahayes` - Now while in edit mode of your `hahayes` switch to your 2nd message so you edit that too - Observe the same message in your chatbox
